    • Method Detail

      • showTextChooserDialog

        public int showTextChooserDialog()
        the show method used to display the JFontChooser dialog wit hthe default values
        Returns:
        the user selection value which is either APPROVE_OPTION or CANCEL_OPTION

      • showTextChooserDialog

        public int showTextChooserDialog(java.lang.String fontName,
                        int fontStyle,
                        int fontSize,
                        java.awt.Color textColor,
                        java.lang.String text)
        the show method used to display the JFontChooser dialog with specified values
        Parameters:
        fontName - the default installed font name
        fontStyle - the default font style which may be Font.PLAIN, Font.ITALIC or Font.BOLD;
        fontSize - the default font size
        textColor - the default font foreground color
        text - the default text to be displayed
        Returns:
        the user selection value which is either APPROVE_OPTION or CANCEL_OPTION
